# Controller Probing Cycles

> **Skill ID:** `prism-controller-probing`
> **Category:** CONTROLLER
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Touch probe operations

## Capabilities

- Handle probing cycles for all controller families

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in controller probing cycles.

### When to Use

- When working with controller
